trans-unit.source: Live Navigator is a solution for the protection of file servers, laptops, and workstations using a client/server architecture: a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server protecting <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents in a network.

seg-source.mrk: Live Navigator is a solution for the protection of file servers, laptops, and workstations using a client/server architecture: a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server protecting <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents in a network.

target.mrk: Lina est une solution de protection de serveurs de fichiers, d’ordinateurs portables et de bureau fonctionnant sur une architecture de type client/serveur : un serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protégeant des agents<MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur un réseau.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">This <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> online help describes how the software works and enables administrators to install, configure and administer their <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> server and agents.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">This <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> online help describes how the software works and enables administrators to install, configure and administer their <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> server and agents.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">L'aide en ligne <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> décrit le fonctionnement du logiciel et permet à l’administrateur d’installer, configurer et administrer son serveur et ses agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">This <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> online help describes how the software works and enables users to configure <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">This <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> online help describes how the software works and enables users to configure <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cette aide en ligne <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> décrit le fonctionnement du logiciel et permet aux utilisateurs de configurer <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" />.</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: This online documentation provides information about <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, an option that enables to take advantage of block-level deduplication technology to improve backup performances and lower storage costs.

seg-source.mrk: This online documentation provides information about <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, an option that enables to take advantage of block-level deduplication technology to improve backup performances and lower storage costs.

target.mrk: Cette documentation fournit des informations sur le <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, une option qui permet d'utiliser la déduplication de blocs afin d'améliorer les performances de sauvegarde, tout en diminuant les coûts de stockage de données.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.BMR" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> The Bare Metal Recovery (herein called BMR) is a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> module used to recover a complete Windows agent (system and data).</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.BMR" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> The Bare Metal Recovery (herein called BMR) is a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> module used to recover a complete Windows agent (system and data).</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.BMR" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Le Bare Metal Recovery (ci-après appelé BMR) est un module <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /> utilisé pour récupérer un agent Windows complet (système et données).</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: You can access the topics directly by clicking a topic name on the navigation panel.

seg-source.mrk: You can access the topics directly by clicking a topic name on the navigation panel.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez ouvrir une rubrique en cliquant sur son nom dans le volet de navigation.
